Item.sqlserver_body:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[innovator].[WORKFLOW_TASK]')) IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM [WORKFLOW_TASK]) RAISERROR ('Cannot drop [WORKFLOW_TASK] since records exist there', 16, 1) ELSE DROP TABLE [WORKFLOW_TASK]
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[innovator].[WORKFLOW_TASK]')) DROP VIEW [WORKFLOW_TASK]
Item.name: Workflow_Task_Step01_Drop
